reason.raw: Seed was added on pull request #95, and visuals for other tasks are not needed anymore
reason.html: Seed was added on pull request #95, and visuals for other tasks are not needed anymore

description.raw:
* Add optional seed to random world generator, for example:

    `erb s=111111 unique.world.erb > unique.world`

* Worlds with only one task now have visuals for the other tasks. These are the current `unique*` worlds, which were generated with seed 111111:

    world | 
    --- | ---
    unique_task1 | ![t1_111111.png](data/bitbucket.org/repo/xEbAAe/images/3487263097-t1_111111.png)
    unique_task2 | ![t2_111111.png](data/bitbucket.org/repo/xEbAAe/images/734690373-t2_111111.png)
    unique_task3 | ![t3_111111.png](data/bitbucket.org/repo/xEbAAe/images/3335703368-t3_111111.png)
    unique | ![uni_111111.png](data/bitbucket.org/repo/xEbAAe/images/3901572937-uni_111111.png)
description.html:
• Add optional seed to random world generator, for example:

    erb s=111111 unique.world.erb > unique.world

  • Worlds with only one task now have visuals for the other tasks. These are the current unique* worlds, which were generated with seed 111111:

    world
    unique_task1
    unique_task2
    unique_task3
    unique
